title: 2021 Week 1 Preview
itunes:title: 2021 Week 1 Preview
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal are previewing each of the 2021 Week 1 games starting with a little trivia to decide who gets the first pick. The lock of the week competition starts NOW for the 2021 season and two of the heroes actually agreed this week. We start with the Bills and Steelers (12:24) and hit the primetime games before a speed round (1:03:02). 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
